Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 300%{passiveImg:up_g}
*On the 1st, 3rd, 5th, 7th & 9th turns from the character's
entry turn*
- Changes Ki Spheres: STR to AGL
- Launches 2 additional attacks, each of which has a high
chance of becoming a Super Attack
- High chance of evading enemy's attack
- DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} per AGL Ki Sphere obtained (up to 300%)
*On the 2nd, 4th, 6th, 8th & 10th turns from the character's
entry turn*
- Changes Ki Spheres: AGL to STR
- Great chance of launching an additional Super Attack
- Great chance of performing a critical hit
- ATK 30%{passiveImg:up_g} per STR Ki Sphere obtained (up to 300%)
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 33%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Starting from the 7th turn from the start of battle*
- {passiveImg:once}Changes Ki Spheres: AGL & STR to TEQ
- ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} per TEQ Ki Sphere obtained (up to 300%)

5445.superDescription:
Raises ATK and greatly raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes supreme damage to enemy 
and seals Super Attack
